DOC.detailed_description: The project consist two different study : Study I : A randomised controled meal test study aim study acute effect alginate-containing beverage appetite sensation spontaneous calorie intake ( safety i.e . nausea , well-being etc ) normal overweight healthy subject . Here , placebo beverage alginate-containing beverage administer pre-load standardise breakfast meal . Subjective appetite sensation measure Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) every 30 minute four 5 hour . An additional beverage administer prior ad libitum lunch meal , spontaneous water energy intake register . Study II : Secondly aim study effect daily intake placebo alginate-containing beverage body weight composition randomise parallel intervention study 12 week duration . A total app . 50 obese healthy adult receive hypocaloric diet randomise consume either placebo alginate-containing beverage three main meal every day . The development body weight composition blood pressure monitor blood sample analyse marker relate risk CVD type 2 diabetes .
